trans-unit.source: layout: page title: "WebVR Camp" permalink: /webvr-camp/ lang: en ref: webvr-camp parent: activities
trans-unit.target: layout: page title: "WebVR Camp" permalink: /webvr-camp/ lang: ar ref: webvr-camp parent: activities

trans-unit.source: redirect_from: "/developer-engagement/webvr-camp/"
trans-unit.target: redirect_from: "/developer-engagement/webvr-camp/"

trans-unit.source: TOC
trans-unit.target: TOC

trans-unit.source: {:toc}
trans-unit.target: {:toc}

trans-unit.source: [A-Frame](https://aframe.io/) is a web framework for building virtual reality experiences, making it easy for anyone to get involved with virtual reality.
trans-unit.target: [A-Frame](https://aframe.io/) is a web framework for building virtual reality experiences, making it easy for anyone to get involved with virtual reality.

trans-unit.source: Its goal is to onboard developers into 3D and advance WebVR, an open platform for virtual reality that leverages the Web.
trans-unit.target: Its goal is to onboard developers into 3D and advance WebVR, an open platform for virtual reality that leverages the Web.

trans-unit.source: __Having more developers and content creators playing with WebVR is important for the future of virtual reality to help build towards a free and open virtual reality platform not owned by any individual entity__.
trans-unit.target: __Having more developers and content creators playing with WebVR is important for the future of virtual reality to help build towards a free and open virtual reality platform not owned by any individual entity__.

trans-unit.source: A-Frame is used extensively by the Mozilla VR team to prototype and experiment with WebVR.
trans-unit.target: A-Frame is used extensively by the Mozilla VR team to prototype and experiment with WebVR.

trans-unit.source: __Having more contributors know A-Frame will give them a chance to get involved in one of the most exciting revolutions in the field of technology__.
trans-unit.target: __Having more contributors know A-Frame will give them a chance to get involved in one of the most exciting revolutions in the field of technology__.

trans-unit.source: Impact and Metrics
trans-unit.target: Impact and Metrics

trans-unit.source: Goals for this area
trans-unit.target: Goals for this area

trans-unit.source: __Impact:__
trans-unit.target: __Impact:__

trans-unit.source: 200 people signed up to the [A-Frame Slack channel](https://aframe.io/community/#a-frame)
trans-unit.target: 200 people signed up to the [A-Frame Slack channel](https://aframe.io/community/#a-frame)

trans-unit.source: 100 projects built in or for A-Frame
trans-unit.target: 100 projects built in or for A-Frame

trans-unit.source: 20 blog posts about events, activities, experiences, projects, or tutorials.
trans-unit.target: 20 blog posts about events, activities, experiences, projects, or tutorials.

trans-unit.source: 500 social shares with #MozActivate, #WebVRCamp, @aframevr, @mozillavr
trans-unit.target: 500 social shares with #MozActivate, #WebVRCamp, @aframevr, @mozillavr

trans-unit.source: __Strength:__
trans-unit.target: __Strength:__

trans-unit.source: 20 Mobilizers activated
trans-unit.target: 20 Mobilizers activated

trans-unit.source: 30 events
trans-unit.target: 30 events

trans-unit.source: 400 people are introduced to and starting to build with A-Frame
trans-unit.target: 400 people are introduced to and starting to build with A-Frame

trans-unit.source: Audience for this activity
trans-unit.target: Audience for this activity

trans-unit.source: Your audience for this event should be anyone interested in virtual reality including web developers, designers and students.
trans-unit.target: Your audience for this event should be anyone interested in virtual reality including web developers, designers and students.

trans-unit.source: The audience should have a basic grasp of HTML.
trans-unit.target: The audience should have a basic grasp of HTML.

trans-unit.source: Activity Format
trans-unit.target: Activity Format

trans-unit.source: Help us build community around the A-Frame library by conducting a mobilizing / learning event for 20-30 contributors.
trans-unit.target: Help us build community around the A-Frame library by conducting a mobilizing / learning event for 20-30 contributors.

trans-unit.source: 2-4 Weeks Before the Event
trans-unit.target: 2-4 Weeks Before the Event

trans-unit.source: Put an event team together
trans-unit.target: Put an event team together

trans-unit.source: Choose a date and secure a venue
trans-unit.target: Choose a date and secure a venue

trans-unit.source: Setup the event on Reps Portal ([instructions](https://wiki.mozilla.org/ReMo/SOPs/Event_hosting)).
trans-unit.target: Setup the event on Reps Portal ([instructions](https://wiki.mozilla.org/ReMo/SOPs/Event_hosting)).

trans-unit.source: [Find a Rep](https://reps.mozilla.org/people/) closeby to do this if you are not one.
trans-unit.target: [Find a Rep](https://reps.mozilla.org/people/) closeby to do this if you are not one.

trans-unit.source: Give a thought whether it will be self-facilitated or with someone who has A-Frame experience.
trans-unit.target: Give a thought whether it will be self-facilitated or with someone who has A-Frame experience.

trans-unit.source: You can find help on the [Mozilla VR Telegram group](https://telegram.me/MozillaVR) or the [A-Frame Slack channel](https://aframevr-slack.herokuapp.com/)
trans-unit.target: You can find help on the [Mozilla VR Telegram group](https://telegram.me/MozillaVR) or the [A-Frame Slack channel](https://aframevr-slack.herokuapp.com/)

trans-unit.source: Create an event page on a platform popular in your locale, such as Facebook or Meetup.com, and keep posting interesting information about WebVR & related topics to keep continue the conversation
trans-unit.target: Create an event page on a platform popular in your locale, such as Facebook or Meetup.com, and keep posting interesting information about WebVR & related topics to keep continue the conversation

trans-unit.source: Download and customize the [A-Frame Presentation Kit](https://github.com/aframevr/aframe-presentation-kit)
trans-unit.target: Download and customize the [A-Frame Presentation Kit](https://github.com/aframevr/aframe-presentation-kit)

trans-unit.source: Create a few scenes for demo & prototyping purposes.
trans-unit.target: Create a few scenes for demo & prototyping purposes.

trans-unit.source: You can find examples on [awesome-aframe](https://github.com/aframevr/awesome-aframe)
trans-unit.target: You can find examples on [awesome-aframe](https://github.com/aframevr/awesome-aframe)

trans-unit.source: Acquire headsets to use and demo.
trans-unit.target: Acquire headsets to use and demo.

trans-unit.source: Google Cardboard can be acquired in some locations for less than $5 a set.
trans-unit.target: Google Cardboard can be acquired in some locations for less than $5 a set.

trans-unit.source: We recommend 5 headsets for an event of 20-30 people.
trans-unit.target: We recommend 5 headsets for an event of 20-30 people.

trans-unit.source: You can request budget of up to $50 maximum for these headsets but you will have to buy them yourself.
trans-unit.target: You can request budget of up to $50 maximum for these headsets but you will have to buy them yourself.

trans-unit.source: 1 Week Before the Event
trans-unit.target: 1 Week Before the Event

trans-unit.source: Confirmed selected attendees through email.
trans-unit.target: Confirmed selected attendees through email.

trans-unit.source: Distribute the following list of tasks to do before event:
trans-unit.target: Distribute the following list of tasks to do before event:

trans-unit.source: Create a GitHub account if they don’t have one
trans-unit.target: Create a GitHub account if they don’t have one

trans-unit.source: Get familiar with [A-Frame](https://aframe.io/) and [read about areas to contribute](https://github.com/aframevr/aframe/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)
trans-unit.target: Get familiar with [A-Frame](https://aframe.io/) and [read about areas to contribute](https://github.com/aframevr/aframe/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)

trans-unit.source: Join the [A-Frame Slack Channel](https://aframevr-slack.herokuapp.com/)
trans-unit.target: Join the [A-Frame Slack Channel](https://aframevr-slack.herokuapp.com/)

trans-unit.source: [Optional] Play with A-Frame, starting with a [Hello World scene](https://codepen.io/mozvr/pen/BjygdO).
trans-unit.target: [Optional] Play with A-Frame, starting with a [Hello World scene](https://codepen.io/mozvr/pen/BjygdO).

trans-unit.source: Skim through the [documentation](https://aframe.io/docs/0.3.0/introduction/getting-started.html).
trans-unit.target: Skim through the [documentation](https://aframe.io/docs/0.3.0/introduction/getting-started.html).

trans-unit.source: Event Flow
trans-unit.target: Event Flow

trans-unit.source: This is how you can break up a 4 hour event format.
trans-unit.target: This is how you can break up a 4 hour event format.

trans-unit.source: You can try to shorten some sections if you want to do it quicker.
trans-unit.target: You can try to shorten some sections if you want to do it quicker.

trans-unit.source: Getting Started (30 minutes)
trans-unit.target: Getting Started (30 minutes)

trans-unit.source: Introduction of speakers and attendees with an ice breaker session (e.g., [catch the ball](http://businessmajors.about.com/od/icebreakers/a/Icebreaker8.htm))
trans-unit.target: Introduction of speakers and attendees with an ice breaker session (e.g., [catch the ball](http://businessmajors.about.com/od/icebreakers/a/Icebreaker8.htm))

trans-unit.source: About [Mozilla’s mission](https://www.mozilla.org/mission/) as a non-profit and community-focused organization.
trans-unit.target: About [Mozilla’s mission](https://www.mozilla.org/mission/) as a non-profit and community-focused organization.

trans-unit.source: About [VR, WebVR & A-Frame](https://gurumukhi.wordpress.com/2016/09/21/a-frame-for-vr-development-on-web/)
trans-unit.target: About [VR, WebVR & A-Frame](https://gurumukhi.wordpress.com/2016/09/21/a-frame-for-vr-development-on-web/)

trans-unit.source: Quickly note social tags: #MozActivate, #WebVRCamp, @mozillavr
trans-unit.target: Quickly note social tags: #MozActivate, #WebVRCamp, @mozillavr

trans-unit.source: A-Frame [Concepts](https://aframe.io/docs/0.3.0/introduction/) (30 minutes)
trans-unit.target: A-Frame [Concepts](https://aframe.io/docs/0.3.0/introduction/) (30 minutes)

trans-unit.source: [Demo](http://aframe.io/examples) of basic A-Frame scenes & apps.
trans-unit.target: [Demo](http://aframe.io/examples) of basic A-Frame scenes & apps.

trans-unit.source: More examples at [A Week of A-Frame](https://aframe.io/blog/)
trans-unit.target: More examples at [A Week of A-Frame](https://aframe.io/blog/)

trans-unit.source: Show off [A-Painter](https://blog.mozvr.com/a-painter/)
trans-unit.target: Show off [A-Painter](https://blog.mozvr.com/a-painter/)

trans-unit.source: Introduce HTML tags.
trans-unit.target: Introduce HTML tags.

trans-unit.source: If audience is more technical, also introduce the [entity-component-system pattern](https://aframe.io/docs/0.3.0/introduction/#entity-component-system)
trans-unit.target: If audience is more technical, also introduce the [entity-component-system pattern](https://aframe.io/docs/0.3.0/introduction/#entity-component-system)

trans-unit.source: Time to Hack (1 hour)
trans-unit.target: Time to Hack (1 hour)

trans-unit.source: Propose your idea of VR experiences to build
trans-unit.target: Propose your idea of VR experiences to build

trans-unit.source: Can get started with [Codepen](http://codepen.io/mozvr/pen/BjygdO) or the [Boilerplate](https://github.com/aframevr/aframe-boilerplate)
trans-unit.target: Can get started with [Codepen](http://codepen.io/mozvr/pen/BjygdO) or the [Boilerplate](https://github.com/aframevr/aframe-boilerplate)

trans-unit.source: For the boilerplate, we recommend using a local server such as [Mongoose](https://www.cesanta.com/products/binary) or through Node.js.
trans-unit.target: For the boilerplate, we recommend using a local server such as [Mongoose](https://www.cesanta.com/products/binary) or through Node.js.

trans-unit.source: More About A-Frame (30 minutes)
trans-unit.target: More About A-Frame (30 minutes)

trans-unit.source: A-Frame in depth (e.g., demo of advanced scenes, how are they built, using community components)
trans-unit.target: A-Frame in depth (e.g., demo of advanced scenes, how are they built, using community components)

trans-unit.source: Continue Hacking (1 hour)
trans-unit.target: Continue Hacking (1 hour)

trans-unit.source: Improve your VR experience or build something else using more advanced concepts
trans-unit.target: Improve your VR experience or build something else using more advanced concepts

trans-unit.source: Review & Plan (30 minutes)
trans-unit.target: Review & Plan (30 minutes)

trans-unit.source: Review the whole event
trans-unit.target: Review the whole event

trans-unit.source: Talk about [A-Frame community](http://aframe.io/community/).
trans-unit.target: Talk about [A-Frame community](http://aframe.io/community/).

trans-unit.source: Don’t forget to mention if you have a separate communication medium to connect with the local WebVR community (e.g., WebVR-India telegram group)
trans-unit.target: Don’t forget to mention if you have a separate communication medium to connect with the local WebVR community (e.g., WebVR-India telegram group)

trans-unit.source: Discuss takeaways
trans-unit.target: Discuss takeaways

trans-unit.source: Discuss individual action plans and follow-up plans
trans-unit.target: Discuss individual action plans and follow-up plans

trans-unit.source: Output
trans-unit.target: Output

trans-unit.source: Additional to the recommended event flow here are some things we’d like you, the event organizer, to do.
trans-unit.target: Additional to the recommended event flow here are some things we’d like you, the event organizer, to do.

trans-unit.source: Fill out the post-event metrics on the event page you set up on the Reps portal
trans-unit.target: Fill out the post-event metrics on the event page you set up on the Reps portal

trans-unit.source: Thank-You email to attendees with:
trans-unit.target: Thank-You email to attendees with:

trans-unit.source: A feedback form
trans-unit.target: A feedback form

trans-unit.source: Suggestion to Tweet their experience.
trans-unit.target: Suggestion to Tweet their experience.

trans-unit.source: Mention @mozillavr, #MozActivate, and #WebVRCamp
trans-unit.target: Mention @mozillavr, #MozActivate, and #WebVRCamp

trans-unit.source: Suggestion to write a blog post and share
trans-unit.target: Suggestion to write a blog post and share

trans-unit.source: Important links
trans-unit.target: Important links

trans-unit.source: Send an event report or blog post and photo-stream link either over Twitter or Slack.
trans-unit.target: Send an event report or blog post and photo-stream link either over Twitter or Slack.

trans-unit.source: Share a summary [this Discourse thread](https://discourse.mozilla-community.org/t/activate-mozilla-webvr-camp/11190)
trans-unit.target: Share a summary [this Discourse thread](https://discourse.mozilla-community.org/t/activate-mozilla-webvr-camp/11190)

trans-unit.source: Contact
trans-unit.target: Contact

trans-unit.source: Want to find out more about the A-Frame community?
trans-unit.target: Want to find out more about the A-Frame community?

trans-unit.source: Ping us on the [A-Frame Slack channel](https://aframevr-slack.herokuapp.com/) or Tweet at us [@aframevr](https://twitter.com/aframevr).
trans-unit.target: Ping us on the [A-Frame Slack channel](https://aframevr-slack.herokuapp.com/) or Tweet at us [@aframevr](https://twitter.com/aframevr).

trans-unit.source: Visit the [A-Frame community page](https://aframe.io/community/) for more details.
trans-unit.target: Visit the [A-Frame community page](https://aframe.io/community/) for more details.
